title: Coconut Land with Estate Bungalow for sale in Kurunagala.
details:
A Valuable Coconut Land with fully completed Estate Bungalow for sale in Nikaweratiya, Kurunagala. fully tiled House consists of 5 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, living room, pantry kitchen, servant quarters, drive quarters. Nice garden with shrine room.

This 6 Acres coconut land and 3 acres paddy filed with bordering private water tank. facing to Nikaweratiya Colombo main road. Ideal for real estate project or boutique hotel project 800 meters Road front age.

Easy access to government authorities and private office, banks, hospital, super markets.(Town Limit).

- 3 phase Electricity
- Telephone
- Tap line water / well water and other necessary facilities are available here. (3 large wells in the estates).
